level1_start.name: Village Chief
dialogue: Ah, a new face! Welcome, brave adventurer. I'm the Village Chief.
The underground chambers have opened again, unleashing monsters upon us. We need heroes to defend our village.
Archie, Morin, and Black Bullet, step forward and introduce yourselves to our new recruit.

level1_start.name: Archie
dialogue: Hey there! I'm Archie, your go-to guy for all things adventuring. Stick with me, and we'll get through this.
Welcome to the team! Together, we can conquer anything.

level1_start.name: Morin
dialogue: Greetings, I'm Morin. I'll be providing you with the maps and guidance you need.
Let's stay sharp and focused. The path ahead is dangerous.

level1_start.name: Black Bullet
dialogue: I'm Black Bullet. You can count on me for firepower and supplies.
Stay sharp and be cautious. Danger lurks around every corner.

level2.name: Archie
dialogue: Welcome to the upper chambers. Things get trickier from here.
These chambers hold many secrets. Keep your eyes peeled.
Keep an eye out for hidden treasures. They can be very useful.
The monsters here are tougher. Don't let your guard down.

level2.name: Morin
dialogue: Watch your step in these chambers. They're full of traps.
I've heard rumors of hidden rooms filled with treasure.
Remember, teamwork is key. You're not alone in this fight.

level3_boss.name: Archie
dialogue: You've made it to the first boss level. This corrupted tree is a tough one.
Remember to use your special attacks to deal more damage.
Stay on your toes and watch out for its roots!

level3_boss.name: Black Bullet
dialogue: This tree was once a guardian of the forest. Now it's corrupted.
Use fire-based attacks to exploit its weakness.
Defeating this boss will clear the path to deeper chambers. Stay strong.

level4.name: Archie
dialogue: The middle chambers... you're halfway there.
The enemies here are tougher, but so are you.
Keep pushing forward, adventurer. The village is counting on you.

level4.name: Morin
dialogue: These chambers are known for their labyrinth-like structure. Don't get lost.
I've heard tales of a hidden artifact in these chambers.
Stay vigilant. The deeper you go, the more dangerous it becomes.

level5.name: Archie
dialogue: You're so close to the final challenge. Just one more level to go.
The lower chambers are filled with intense threats. Be prepared.
Find the hidden keys to unlock the final chamber.

level5.name: Black Bullet
dialogue: The air is thick with danger here. Stay alert.
Enemies here are more cunning and powerful. Don't underestimate them.
Remember, your ultimate goal is just ahead. Keep your eyes on the prize.

level6_boss.name: Archie
dialogue: This is it. The dragon boss. The final challenge.
Use everything you've learned to defeat it.
Victory here means safety for the village. You can do this!

level6_boss.name: Black Bullet
dialogue: This dragon has been terrorizing the village for centuries. End its reign.
Watch out for its furios attacks. Stay on the move.
Remember, the fate of the village rests on your shoulders. No pressure.

tutorials.name: Archie
dialogue: Use WASD to move around.
Great! Now use left click and hold to attack.
Excellent! Remember, you can switch characters using Q or E.

tutorials.name: Village Chief
dialogue: Before you head out, make sure you're familiar with the controls.
Practice makes perfect. Hone your skills before facing the real threats.
Good luck, adventurer. We're counting on you.

celebrations.name: Village Chief
dialogue: Congratulations on your victory! You've saved the village!
The village is safe once more, thanks to your bravery and skill.

celebrations.name: Archie
dialogue: We did it! The village is finally safe.
Your skills and courage have brought peace to the land.

celebrations.name: Morin
dialogue: Well done, adventurer! Your name will be remembered in our history.
Celebrate this victory, for you have earned it.

celebrations.name: Black Bullet
dialogue: Great job! You really showed those monsters who's boss.
The village owes you a great debt.
